title: Malden- Spacious 4 BD 2BR - Newly Renovated - Sept 01
posting_body: De-leaded, spacious, sun-filled, & high ceiling 4BR plus 2 full baths, 1 large living room, and Eat-in-Kitchen.
Newly painted unit.
New hardwood floors throughout.
Modern Kitchen is fully renovated with hardwood cabinets, granite countertop, and recess ceiling lights.
It could be used as 3 Bed  + 1 study or  4 Bed if shared by a family ( one of the bedrooms is smaller).
Gas heat/hot water/cooking.
Laundry in the basement.
Small backyard.

It is conveniently located on the first floor in a 3-family house in a nice residential area near Malden Center, across from the new Ferryway Elementary School and playground, walking distance to middle schools and high school.
Buses # 104 and # 105 (on Ferry St and Cross St) are just around the corner, less than 5 mins drive to Orange Line- Malden Center Subway Station.
Ample on-street parking in front of the house or within the block.
The area offers grocery stores, restaurants and coffee shops like Starbucks, Dunkinâ€™ Donuts, and more.
Fitness center like Blink, entertainment like Boda Borg, Trampoline parks, and Shopping Centers like Everett Mall & Assembly Row Outlet are all within distance.
Available on SEPTEMBER 1, 2022.
Maximum of 3 people if friends.
Utilities are not included.
The first month, last month and one-month security deposit are required.
No smokers, no pets.
Looking for mature/responsible tenant(s).
Background, credit check, and income verification are required.
Please text or email your contact information, including your phone number, and a brief description of your living situation to arrange a showing.
